DOC.brief_summary: To explore safety, Tolerability and immunogenicity of two formulations of a Meningococcal B Recombinant Vaccine when administered to healthy infants.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Two Different Formulations of Meningococcal B Recombinant Vaccine, When Administered to Healthy Infants
DOC.criteria: healthy 68 months old infants previous receipt of any meningococcal B vaccine; previous ascertained or suspected disease caused by N meningitidis; history of any anaphylactic shock, asthma, urticaria or other allergic reaction after previous vaccinations or known hypersensitivity to any vaccine component; any present or suspected serious acute or chronic disease known or suspected autoimmune disease or impairment /alteration of immune function
